quotes.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.content: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball
